Row.Text: From the shadows, we shape the world. Our knowledge is ancient, our reach is infinite, and our secrets are eternal.
The Illuminati rise from the shadows...
The Illuminati excel at wealth generation and wonder construction. Use your bonus Gold income and unique Culture Tree to unlock powerful traditions and masteries.
The Illuminati were founded in Ingolstadt, Bavaria in 1776 by Adam Weishaupt, a professor of law who sought to create a society based on reason and enlightenment.
Legend speaks of the Ark of the Covenant being hidden by the Knights Templar after their persecution in 1307, its location known only to a select few initiates.
The Eye of Providence, or All-Seeing Eye, has been used as a symbol of divine omniscience since ancient Egypt, later adopted by various secret societies.
The Knights Templar were warrior monks who protected pilgrims traveling to the Holy Land, amassing great wealth and influence before their sudden dissolution.
Throughout history, shadowy organizations have shaped events from behind the scenes, their true influence known only to those within their inner circles.
